dcterms:creator: S. Narayan
S. B. Cohen
M. Lapata
dcterms:description: XSUM contains 226,711 online British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) articles covering domains like news, politics, sports, business and more. Each article is paired with a single sentence summary written by the BBC journalists. The dataset is split into three subsets: training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: XSUM

dcterms:creator: M. Cao
Y. Dong
J. Cheung
dcterms:description: XENT contains 800 article and summary pairs where the articles are sampled from the XSUM test set and the summaries are generated using a fine-tuned BART model. Each entity in the summary is annotated with three labels: non-hallucinated, factual hallucination, and non-factual hallucination.
dcterms:title: XENT
